metadata.title: Rubénerd Show 291 2015-09-06
metadata.creator: Ruben Schade
metadata.description:
The veg episode.

27:30 – A quiet celebration of one fortnight as a vegetarian. A bit of the philosophy (but not too much), some amazing new food I found along the way, and a big thanks to everyone for your support. Let’s see how long this lasts!

Recorded in Sydney, Australia. Licence for this track: Creative Commons Attribution 3.0. Attribution: Ruben Schade.

Released September 2015 on The Overnightscape Underground, an Internet talk radio channel focusing on a freeform monologue style, with diverse and fascinating hosts (this one notwithstanding).

Subscribe with iTunes, Pocket Casts, Overcast or add this feed to your podcast client.
